title: AdCall: Bringing WebRTC to display ads
subtitle: The first advertising banner with video calls

content.body: AdCall is a concept for a new kind of online advertising banner. Using WebRTC, it allows for a click to call action with the aim of increasing conversions. It's built with a Node backend and deployed on Heroku.
